description: Elven Cloak, woven with a spell of concealment, blending perfectly with natural surroundings
Palantir, a seeing-stone of old, capable of distant communication and vision
Ent's Draught, a mysterious liquid that grants strength and vitality
Ring of Power, a ring of great influence and danger, forged in the fires of Mount Doom
Lembas Bread, Elven waybread, one small bite can fill the stomach of a grown man
Phial of Galadriel, a small crystal phial containing the light of Earendil's star
Hobbit's Pipe, a finely crafted wooden pipe used by Hobbits of the Shire
Scroll of Ancient Lore, an old scroll containing forgotten knowledge and spells
Mithril Vest, a lightweight and incredibly strong armor, shimmering like silver
Gondorian Horn, a horn used for signaling in battles, carrying sound over long distances
Elf Stone, a gemstone with healing properties, once belonging to the Elves of Valinor
Dwarf Map, an ancient map showing hidden passages and secret doors, from the Dwarven realms
Ranger's Bow, a longbow used by the Rangers of the North, known for its accuracy
Sword of the King, a legendary sword, symbolizing the return of the true king
Rohan's Medallion, a token of honor given by the horse-lords of Rohan
